meta.hint:
Past tense verbs tell about something that has already happened.
To make a past tense verb, you usually just add -ed.
walk → walkedexample We walked to the shops yesterday.
If the verb already ends with an -e, you just add -d.
bake → bakedexample Jane baked a cake last week.
meta.question: Complete the sentence in the past tense.

content.description: Tom ______ his closet to find his coat.
I ______ asked my mother to make sandwiches for me.
